Export.Routine: INARTUPCD3 ;INARTUPCD3;CHECK UPC CODE ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| CHECK UPC CODE ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| 7-Oct-2005 JW SR13637: WWWDATEN is not shared ;| ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; NEW KEY1 SET KEY1=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"P",1)) QUIT:$PIECE(KEY1,",",3)="" ;KEIN KEY VORHANDEN QUIT:$GET(YINHALT)="" ;FELD LEER IF $PIECE(KEY1,",",3)=$GET(YINHALT) DO . SET %TXT(1)="#Y"_YFORM_"D3~"_"" . SET %TXT(1)=%TXT(1)_"#!"_$$^WWWTEXT(34076,,1) ;AUSWAHL NICHT MÃ–GLICH . QUIT QUIT
